last_episode_to_air.name: The Teacher
last_episode_to_air.overview: A beautiful woman engages in an adulterous affair with a sexy stranger at her exclusive tennis club. What she doesn't realize in the midst of her amorous interludes is that her husband has arranged for this seduction in order to reap the rewards of her heightened passions.

name: Red Shoe Diaries
overview: Jake takes out an ad in the newspaper after the suicide of his unfaithful fiancée, in an effort to understand the reasons for the betrayal. By soliciting the secret diaries of other women, he hopes to find some reconciliation with the truth.
tagline: Trapped by a burning secret. Torn by a blazing desire.

episodes.name: Safe Sex
episodes.overview: When a beautiful, consummately professional woman accepts a ride in the rain from a handsome stranger, she steps into a world where nothing is forbidden... except their real identities. As their passion grows, she finds out that there is no such thing as “safe sex.”

episodes.name: Double Dare
episodes.overview: A woman considers infidelity with a man in a nearby office building

episodes.name: You Have the Right to Remain Silent
episodes.overview: Lynn is a very disciplined policewoman who's obsessive about her work, her relationships and her body. She's noticed by every guy at the gym—except for Nick, a power lawyer and power athlete. Nick always gets what he wants when he wants it and always wins. Lynn has finally met her match until she decides to use her badge to her advantage. She pulls Nick over for a minor traffic violation, arrests him and takes him to an abandoned loft. Now that she has power over him, Lynn won't let Nick go until she gets what she wants.

episodes.name: Talk to Me Baby
episodes.overview: Ida is a beautiful and wild European. Bud, her boyfriend, loves Ida—but can't help himself when it comes to the ladies. When Ida finds him in the men's room with the winner of a wet T-shirt contest she is understandably livid. He'll do anything to win back Ida, even if it means killing them both in the process.

episodes.name: Just Like That
episodes.overview:
Receptionist Trudie's straightforward life becomes complicated when two men fall for her on the same day. Unable to choose between bizarrely dress courier, Kyle, and businessman Phillip, she initially ignores the advances of both. Eventually she surprises herself by joining Kyle in a ""broken down"" elevator and later that same day finds herself in bed with the toe-sucking Phillip.

Throughout the episode Trudie two-times the men, never knowing whether to go dancing with Kyle or dining with Phillip, and growing more attached to both. Things inevitably come to an awkward end when she runs into both men at the same time.

episodes.name: Another Woman's Lipstick
episodes.overview: A woman obsessed with her lover's mistress is torn between sadness and desire. After watching the two rendez-vous, the wife dons men's clothing and follows her. Before you know it the husband is finding lipstick traces on her collar!

episodes.name: Accidents Happen
episodes.overview: Daria becomes the maid for a very in love couple but she has trouble understanding their language of love until she finds a novel way to fit into the happy household.

episodes.name: Auto Erotica
episodes.overview: After a late night at work, Claudia is ready to burn off some steam, and her new sports car is a perfect release. She gets more action than she bargained for when she has a near-miss accident with a foxy pedestrian. Suddenly he's behind the wheel and pursuing her through the predawn streets of L.A. and the empty highways of the Mojave desert, into the new day and a new sexual awakening.

episodes.name: Emily's Dance
episodes.overview: Emily is elated and terrified when she is chosen to be the lead dancer in a hot new video, the pressure builds when she meets the beautiful star of her video. She panics until he finds a way to bring Emily out of her shell and into the spotlight.

episodes.name: The Bounty Hunter
episodes.overview: A statuesque female bounty hunter is given her toughest hands-on assignment yet. She must nab a seductive con-man who has made a career out of charming women out of their fortunes. He catches on to her game before she even rolls the dice, and works his magic on her until the two are entwined in an intense match of intelligence, psychological instinct, and pure lust.

episodes.name: Jake's Story
episodes.overview: Go deep into the mind of the man in search of the truth... A woman fascinated by Jake's Red Shoes personal ad makes it her mission to track him down. Once she meets him, she realizes he's too emotionally scarred to be seduced. However, Kate's direct, sensual nature breaks down his defenses. Once he opens himself up, he finds himself trapped in a situation that only serves to remind him of his painful past.

episodes.name: Weekend Pass
episodes.overview: A woman at an army base gets a weekend pass on Christmas Eve. Feeling alone during a most festive time of year, she gathers a couple of girlfriends to hit the town for a night of wild abandon at a local bar. Wild indeed! After a bar-room brawl, she comes into contact with a drifter named Eddie and the two end up having a Christmas they'll never forget.

episodes.name: Double or Nothing
episodes.overview: A formerly pampered woman is left high and dry by a skunk of an ex-boyfriend. Left to rely only on her own devices, she takes to hustling pool. She revels in her newfound independence and financial prosperity and then Tommy comes along. Threatened by the pool shark he is, it's only a matter of time before he has his eight ball in her side pocket and the duo are a smooth combo shot of passion.

episodes.name: How I Met My Husband
episodes.overview: A shy dominatrix trainee meets a husband.

episodes.name: Midnight Bells
episodes.overview: A woman reflects on a New Year's affair.

episodes.name: Night of Abandon
episodes.overview: A family crisis prompts a shy Isabelle to head for Rio de Janeiro. When there, she attends a wild pagan New Year festival during which all her wishes come true in a night of wild sensual abandon.

episodes.name: Naked in the Moonlight
episodes.overview: Once upon a time two lovers from opposite sides of the tracks were torn apart by the girl's disapproving father. Fifteen years later, she pulls her inheritance, dad's vintage Cadillac, into the auto shop and the hunky mechanic servicing her looks hauntingly familiar.

episodes.name: Hotline
episodes.overview: When Tess takes a job as a receptionist she discovers the company is actually a love hotline, unsure at first she quickly enjoys the fantasies and brings them home to her husband, bringing passion back into her dormant marriage.

episodes.name: Runway
episodes.overview: A taxi ride leads to spiritual and sensual bliss for a fashion model upset with the limitations of her superficial career.

episodes.name: Kidnap
episodes.overview: An investment banker meets a cowboy during a robbery.

episodes.name: Burning Up
episodes.overview: A lonely lady cannot stop thinking about the Adonis-like fireman she saw rescue a woman from a burning house. She becomes completely consumed by the flames of a sultry obsession. Her searing desire leads her to set the stage of a dream seduction that is beyond too hot to handle -- it could be downright fatal for her!

episodes.name: Borders of Salt
episodes.overview: Claudia and Paul are strangers on a train, who, by a twist of fate end up sitting next to each other for supper. Verbal foreplay becomes the appetizer as the two engage in an intimate conversation that becomes the most truthful soul-searching exchange either one has ever encountered. Their words soon lead to touch, and an evening of utter ecstasy follows. Can this bliss be sustained?

episodes.name: The Game
episodes.overview: Lilly talks about the Red Shoe Diaries board game - a contest of sexual fantasy and intrigue. Tell... Touch... Show... Wild Card. Lilly is caught in a whirlwind of passion and sensuality, more uninhibited... and more obsessed.

episodes.name: Liar's Tale
episodes.overview: A journalist researches a report on prostitution.

episodes.name: In the Blink of an Eye
episodes.overview: Kathryn's a horse trainer who's happily married to Kirk, a boxing trainer. When Rob, one of Kirk's virile boxers, enters Kathryn's stable her heart starts to trot. When Kirk discovers their tryst, he's set to deliver his own knockout blow.

episodes.name: Some Things Never Change
episodes.overview: After years apart, a man and a woman reunite. They try to come to terms with each other's needs and soon discover their passions haven't dampened.

episodes.name: You Make Me Want to Wear Dresses
episodes.overview: Calahan has a passion for dresses and Brandy absolutely hates them. But with a little, not so sweet, Texan persuasion, Brandy eventually relents. And she realizes that she loves the man who found the way to access her untamed heart.

episodes.name: Gina
episodes.overview: A married woman is attracted to a boxer.

episodes.name: Alphabet Girl
episodes.overview: Vanessa's a supermodel paying the price for both her beauty and fame. She's steeped in the dazzling and destructive world of the fashion industry, but one true friendship saves her. The problem is it's with the assistant to her photographer-boyfriend.

episodes.name: The Psychiatrist
episodes.overview: Sofa, so good. Couch time becomes quality time for a doctor and a very good patient. But is it all pillow talk for this doctor?

episodes.name: Written Word
episodes.overview: A Sexy professor fantasizes about her favourite student

episodes.name: Like Father, Like Son
episodes.overview: When Jamie first met Celeste, she was his father's lover. It was many years ago. He might have been a boy then, but he knew love and he felt it for her. When the two meet again, he is a grown man, and she is wiser still sexy after all these years. Against her better judgement, she falls for Jamie's advances, for he is impossible to resist. It is then she learns the truth to the saying "like father, like son," and what a blissful lesson it is...

episodes.name: Girl on a Bike
episodes.overview: A man falls instantly in love with a girl he sees walking down the street. When the rushed woman hops on her bike and speeds off, he can't let this vision ride out of his life. He hops on his moped and earnestly chases her throughout the streets of Paris...and straight into her heart.

episodes.name: The Cake
episodes.overview: A woman tries to spice up her love life by turning herself into a cake for her husband's birthday

episodes.name: Four on the Floor
episodes.overview: Four friends speeding through a rainfall get into a minor car accident. Stranded in the middle of nowhere, the couples run to a nearby abandoned house with no phone connection. Fortunately, the combination of each other's company, a fireplace, a lot of wine and a bed is an equation for a memorable sensual experience.

episodes.name: Mercy
episodes.overview: A husband imprisoned by his inability to sexually please his wife allows her to have a tryst with an ex-con.

episodes.name: Divorce, Divorce
episodes.overview: Lily and Nick are in the middle of a nasty divorce when fate throws them together for one night. Just one night away from the everyday of their lives and this once happy couple learns to reinvent a love that they had written off as lost.

episodes.name: Hard Labor
episodes.overview: An advertising whiz thinks that she has it all until her boyfriend's ex-flame steps in to destroy her romance.

episodes.name: Luscious Lola
episodes.overview: Unable to show her true feelings for the man she loves, mild-mannered Mimi drifts into reveries in which she is the confident, sexual and brazen Lola.

episodes.name: Slow Train
episodes.overview: A woman relives a long ago love affair through the sexual escapades catalogued in her Grandmother's diary.

episodes.name: Tears
episodes.overview: A renowned choreographer is tormented by the loss of his first love. A young talented dancer tries to soft shoe her way into his life and win his heart, but finds she is trapped in a love triangle with the ghost of his former love.

episodes.name: The Last Motel
episodes.overview:
A struggling couple spends a weekend in a motel room searching for answers. What they find in this intimate setting may surprise you.

One sailor. Four rooms. Five Women.

episodes.name: Jump
episodes.overview: An exhilarating (and romantic) sky-dive makes a young bride-to-be realize that there's a side of life she must experience before she takes the plunge.

episodes.name: The Forbidden Zone
episodes.overview: A woman unlocks the door to the deepest recesses of her imagination to save her dwindling relationship. It is a world of heightened senses, unbridled imagination -- A place of lust and sensuality. It is...The Forbidden Zone.

episodes.name: Juarez
episodes.overview: A young woman visits Mexico and gets pinned by a masked wrestler...

episodes.name: Caged Bird
episodes.overview: Dakota is a smart, sexy tough woman who has been hurt too many times to let her guard down. In prison, she meets a guard, Charlie Parker. Dakota pulls out all her tricks trying to seduce him, to show him that he’s no different than every other man who has done her wrong. This time though, Dakota is wrong. Charlie is different.

episodes.name: Cowboy, Cowboy
episodes.overview: After the breakup of her marriage, Susan seeks the calm reprieve of the countryside where she was raised. While settling back into her old lifestyle, she gets roped into a romance with her high school sweetheart, a local wild boy who she has no interest in taming.

episodes.name: Picnic
episodes.overview: Caught in a dilemma between her jealous boyfriend and another man, a woman suggests another arrangement.

episodes.name: Swimming Naked
episodes.overview: A female lifeguard learns a thing or two about the breast stroke when a male Olympic swimmer starts to train at her pool.

episodes.name: Dime a Dance
episodes.overview: A trio of women work at the Stardust, the last of the dime-a-dance joints. All are grief-stricken over the loss of their father figure band leader, Arnie. Leave it to Michael, his suave Sinatra-esque replacement, to soothe their achy broken hearts and fill the void in each of their lives.

episodes.name: Laundrymat
episodes.overview: A lonely single mother's passions flare when she meets a handsome drifter late one night at the Laundromat. After a night together they go their separate ways as strangers but realizes that passion is what makes a soul survive.

episodes.name: As She Wishes
episodes.overview: A suicidal sado-masochistic (yet beautiful) woman experiences a tender unconditional love with a hunky hermit who rescued her after she was washed ashore on a deserted island.

episodes.name: Weightless
episodes.overview: A beautiful astronaut trapped in a dying spacecraft a million miles away from home, makes tender love for the last time with her co-pilot as she ruminates about sensual path of her life that led her to the adventure of outer space.

episodes.name: Farmer's Daughter
episodes.overview: Out on a country road, a young cyclist is injured during a training ride and finds himself being nursed back to health by the amorous daughter of a vineyard owner.

episodes.name: Details
episodes.overview: A sheltered uptight businesswoman learns to relax when an Italian chef starts tooling around with her Alfa Romeo and cooks up a storm with her hormones.

episodes.name: Jealousy
episodes.overview: Two newlyweds have their honeymoon interrupted when the bride learns she has landed a dream role in a major feature film. When shešs whisked away to the set, her morose hubby becomes mired with jealous reveries envisioning her in one love scene after another with her sexy leading man.

episodes.name: The Teacher
episodes.overview: A beautiful woman engages in an adulterous affair with a sexy stranger at her exclusive tennis club. What she doesn't realize in the midst of her amorous interludes is that her husband has arranged for this seduction in order to reap the rewards of her heightened passions.
